title: Fitletic Hydra 16 Running Belt
description: The best running belt I've found. Doesn't bounce, holds two 8 oz bottles of water, a large phone, ID cards, and I also carry pepper spray and swimming goggles with it.

title: REI Co-op On The Trail Cap
description: My running hat. Comfy, lightweight, keeps the UV rays off of my noggin, and has taken a ton of abuse and still looks new after a gentle handwash.

title: Janji M's 5" AFO Middle Short
description: My favorite running shorts. Lightweight and doubles as swim trunks for a post-run dip.

title: ASICS NOVOBLAST 5 Running Shoes
description: Running shoes that feel great and are super responsive.

title: Shokz OPENRUN PRO 2 Headphones
description: Bone conduction sports headphones-- very comfortable, long battery life, and decent audio.

title: Apple Macbook Air M1
description: My workhorse of a laptop that runs everything I throw at it. There are faster ones out there now but this machine has been ultra-reliable.

title: Ridge 8mm Silicone Ring Set
description: Metal rings and their proclivity to deglove fingers always scared the hell out of me. These are soft but durable and won't rip your flesh off if you get them caught on something.

title: Sublime Text
description: My go-to editor for manipulating text and mapping out ideas in code

title: Visual Studio Code
description: My daily driver for delegating programmming tasks to AI minions

title: kitty terminal emulator
description: My terminal program of choice-- extremely configurable and dependable.

title: Ecosia Browser
description: The greenest browser on Earth. Chrome, but less crap and more good
